example.eg: Several people were identified as possible suspects in the robbery.
example.egtrans: 好几个人被认为是这起抢劫案的嫌疑犯。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 认为是, 经过鉴定证实是

example.eg: Even though I'm now a manager, I understand the workers' problems; I was one of them once, so I can identify.
example.egtrans: 即便我现在担任经理一职，还是很难理解工人的问题；我自己曾经就是工人，所以能与他们产生共鸣。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 认同, 同情, 与…产生共鸣

example.eg: A person who identifies as non-binary may use the pronoun "they".
example.egtrans: 认同自己是非二位性别的人可以使用“they”作为人称代词。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自我认同为, 认为自己是

example.eg: I really identify with the characters in the movie.
example.egtrans: 电影中的角色让我产生了极大的共鸣。

example.eg: Anybody who has been through the same experience will be able to identify with Amy's disappointment.
example.egtrans: 有同样经历的人都能感受到艾米的失望之情。

example.eg: Voters identify the party leader with a new kind of politics.
The largest group of people that don't identify themselves with a religion is young people.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 参与（团体等）, 和…打成一片
